Interface DataReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CsvReader

    public interface DataReader

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getRowNumber() 
      int getRowsRead() 
      int ignoreRows(int rowsToIgnore)
      Ignore the given number of rows.

    • Method Detail

      • readSome

        int readSome(int rowsToRead)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    DataException
        Read the given number of rows from input. Reading stops when rowsToRead rows are read, EOF is reached, or an exception occurs.
        Parameters:
        rowsToRead - maximum number of Rows to be read
        Returns:
        the number of rows read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        DataException

      • readAll

        int readAll()
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   DataException
        Read rows till end of input is reached.
        Returns:
        the number of rows read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        DataException

      • ignoreRows

        int ignoreRows(int rowsToIgnore)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Ignore the given number of rows.
        Parameters:
        rowsToIgnore - maximum number of Rows to be read.
        Returns:
        the number of rows ignored.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getRowNumber

        int getRowNumber()
        Returns:
        the number of the current row, zero based

      • getRowsRead

        int getRowsRead()
        Returns:
        the number of rows read. Unless ignore was called, this will be equal to the value returned by getRowNumber().
